item.title: Lynne add a quote by Maya Banks
item.description: "Sometimes forgiveness is the hardest thing to give, but the most cherished thing to receive." -- Maya Banks

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Linda Grayson
item.description: "There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate." -- Linda Grayson

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Christine Feehan
item.description: "Life gives us choices. You either grab on with both hands and just go for it, or you sit on the sidelines." -- Christine Feehan

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "In politics, If you want anything said, ask a man. If you want anything done, ask a woman." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Every woman is a rebel." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Never leave a friend behind. Friends are all we have to get us through this life--and they are the only things from this world that we could hope to see in the next." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Lynne add a quote by James Lecesne
item.description: "This is how it works. I love the people in my life, and I do for my friends whatever they need me to do for them, again and again, as many times as is necessary. For example, in your case you always forgot who you are and how much you're loved. So what I do for you as your friend is remind you who you are and tell you how much I love you. And this isn't any kind of burden for me, because I love who you are very much. Every time I remind you, I get to remember with you, which is my pleasure." -- James Lecesne

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Everyone wants to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Tori Amos
item.description: "Girls you've gotta know when it's time to turn the page." -- Tori Amos

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Lora Leigh
item.description: "You don't change what you love or you never loved it to begin with." -- Lora Leigh

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Jule Styne
item.description: "Diamonds are a girl's best friend." -- Jule Styne
